segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to identify the type and the function of the message (registration, confirmation of registration, request of details on a worker's Social Security insurance record, answer to this request, ...) and, if necessary, the number of the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date of preparation of the message.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment indicating the type of process the message belongs to.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying a previous message, related to the current message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference of a previously sent or received message related to the current message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date of a previous message whose reference is given in the above RFF segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the parties and/or workers, its or his relatives and giving related information. e.g. giving the workers insurance or identification numbers.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, A segment giving a person's surnames and forenames and his function in the message (worker, worker's mother, father, spouse).

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation: GIR, A segment indicating the Insurance or identification numbers of the worker in the country identified in the related PNA segment.

segment.name: Nationality
segment.documentation: NAT, A segment indicating the nationality of the person identified in the related PNA segment.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment specifying the type and the number of an identity document (identity card or passport) belonging to the person identified in the related PNA segment.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, A segment indicating current and if relevant, the previous address of the person.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, A segment specifying person's natural, professional or academic titles.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments giving the person's birth or death details.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating date of birth or date of death of the person.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, A segment indicating place of birth or place of death. This segment can be used to identify the country, province or department and city of birth or death.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments giving details on the person's gender and marital status.

segment.name: Person demographic information
segment.documentation: PDI, A segment specifying the gender or the marital status (married, divorced, ...) of the person identified in the related PNA segment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating relevant dates related to the civil status (date of marriage or date of divorce, ...).

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment giving additional information on the worker.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying the details of authentication.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment specifying the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the SSREGW message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date and where necessary, the time of authentication.
